p: Previous medical history included syphilis, which was cured. The ART is Efavirenz 600 mg, Zidovudine 300 mg, and Lamivudine 150 mg. After that, she continued the ART regularly. Although the nadir CD4 + T cell count was 224, a recent test was normal. The HIV viral load remained undetectable from 2013 (Figs. 1, 2).
